title: ASPNETCOMPILER : error 1014: The -aptca switch can only be used if keyfile or keycontainer is specified.
body:
### Steps to reproduce

```
git clone https://github.com/Jeff-Tian/blogengine.net#a2080a49
msbuild Source\BlogEngine\BlogEngine.sln /p:Configuration=Release /p:DeployOnBuild=true /p:PublishProfile=FolderProfile
```

Directory contents:
```
/
- a.cs
- b.cs
- dir/
     - c.cs
```

Command line
```
msbuild Source\BlogEngine\BlogEngine.sln /p:Configuration=Release /p:DeployOnBuild=true /p:PublishProfile=FolderProfile
```
### Expected behavior
build succeed

### Actual behavior
build fail

### Environment data
`msbuild /version` output:
```
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 16.4.0+e901037fe for .NET Framework
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

16.4.0.56107
```


OS info: Windows 10

**build without any extra parameters will succeed.**
```
msbuild Source\BlogEngine\BlogEngine.sln 
```
And if I use Visual Studio to open the solution file, click "build" will succeed.
